headline: Arista Networks, Inc. Reports Fourth Quarter and Year End 2025 Financial Results
summary: SANTA CLARA, Calif., February 12, 2026--Arista Networks, Inc. (NYSE: ANET), an industry leader in data-driven, client-to-cloud networking for large AI, data center, campus, and routing environments, today announced financial results for its fourth quarter and the full year ended December 31, 2025.

headline: Broadcom Targets AI Edge With New Wi Fi 8 Enterprise Platform
summary: Broadcom (NasdaqGS:AVGO) introduced what it describes as the industry's first Wi-Fi 8 enterprise networking solution tailored for AI ready networks. The launch includes a unified Wi-Fi 8 access point and switch platform designed for AI optimized enterprise connectivity. The new platform integrates security, telemetry, and AI acceleration features for data centers and enterprise networks. For you as an investor, this move is directly tied to Broadcom's core business in high performance...
